name: The Wiz Gamblers: Jungle Jump
description:
A mario-style 2D platformer. Explore the jungle covered ruins to find the treasure, while fighting off swarms of ants and snakes. Headbutt the moss-less platforms for powerups and shoot the enemies for points.

Controls:

A & D to move left and right.

W to jump.

Use the mouse to aim your gun.

Left click to shoot.
